name: limestone quarry construction | limestone quarry infrastructure | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5993/documentation

This dataset represents the construction of 1 limestone mine. Data are estimated from air-picture and the mine is considered to have an annual yield of about 380'000 t;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

From unoccupied land forseen for a limestone mine.

The activity ends with the constructed mine. The dataset includes the 'land-use' of the built part of the mine and therefore the production places and the paved roads
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data was obtained from Swiss companies.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Data corresponds to a medium size Swiss limestone mine.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data is based on a Swiss company (KFN), with a yearly production of  381â€˜028 t (2001).

exchanges.description: The modules considers a limestone mine with an average yearly production of about 380.000t.
